EMPTY_STATE.TITLE: No Bulk SMS campaigns are available
EMPTY_STATE.SUBTITLE: Launch a targeted SMS campaign to reach your customers. Send offers or make announcements with ease. Click 'Create campaign' to get started.

CREATE.TITLE: Create Bulk Campaign
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Target specific customers based on car brands, models, and more.

BULK.SMS_DESCRIPTION: Send a standard text message. Carrier fees may apply.
BULK.EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Send a rich content email to the customer's registered address.
BULK.IN_APP_DESCRIPTION: Push a notification directly inside your mobile application.
BULK.FILTERING_BY_USER_COUNT: Filtering for items with {min} to {max} users.
BULK.TITLE: Title
BULK.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter your message here. Use {customer_name}, {brand}, {model} for personalization.
BULK.VARIABLES_HELP_TEXT: You can use {customer_name}, {brand}, and {model} as dynamic variables.
BULK.CAMPAIGN_CREATED_SUCCESS_WITH_COUNT: Campaign created successfully for {count} customer. | Campaign created successfully for {count} customers.
BULK.NO_FILTERS_SELECTED_FOR_FETCH: Please select at least one brand or model to fetch customers.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error. Please try again.

PREVIEW.FILL_FORM_MESSAGE: Fill out the campaign content and select an audience to generate a preview.
PREVIEW.TITLE: Title

ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error. Please check your connection.
ERRORS.AUTH_FAILED: Authentication failed. Please check your API token.
ERRORS.ACCESS_DENIED: Access Denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
ERRORS.ENDPOINT_NOT_FOUND: The requested API endpoint was not found (404).
ERRORS.INVALID_REQUEST: Invalid request. Please check the provided data (422).
ERRORS.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
ERRORS.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An internal server error occurred (500). Please try again later.
ERRORS.REQUEST_TIMEOUT: The request timed out. Please try again.
ERRORS.NO_RESPONSE: No response from the server. Please check your network.
ERRORS.INVALID_DATA_FORMAT: Received invalid data format from the API.
ERRORS.FAILED_FETCH_BRANDS: Failed to fetch car brands. Please try again.
ERRORS.FAILED_FETCH_MODELS: Failed to fetch car models. Please try again.
ERRORS.INVALID_CUSTOMER_DATA: Received invalid data format from the customer API.
ERRORS.FAILED_FETCH_CUSTOMERS: Failed to fetch customer data. Please check the filters and try again.

CUSTOMERS.NO_BRANDS_MATCH_FILTER: No brands match the current user count filter.
CUSTOMERS.NO_MODELS_MATCH_FILTER: No models match the current user count filter.
CUSTOMERS.NO_BRANDS_AVAILABLE: No brands available from the API.
CUSTOMERS.NO_MODELS_AVAILABLE: No models available for selected brand(s).

CONFIRM_DELETE.DESCRIPTION: The delete action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
